name: InsiderThreat
description: Case template for managing insider threat incidents.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation and mitigation of an insider threat.

tasks.title: Identify suspicious activity
tasks.description: Determine the scope of the suspicious behavior and the impacted resources.

tasks.title: Collect evidence
tasks.description: Gather logs, emails, and other relevant data to build a timeline and identify the parties involved.

tasks.title: Secure affected resources
tasks.description: Protect impacted resources by changing access controls and revoking credentials.

tasks.title: Interview involved parties
tasks.description: Interview the suspected individual and any potential witnesses to gather more information.

tasks.title: Implement security improvements
tasks.description: Apply and update security measures to prevent future insider threats.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Review the incident and update internal procedures to strengthen the insider threat response.

notes.title: Suspicious activity
notes.content: Details about the suspicious activity that triggered the investigation.

notes.title: Collected evidence
notes.content: Summary of the evidence gathered during the investigation.

notes.title: Interview results
notes.content: Summary of the interviews conducted during the investigation.

notes.title: Lessons learned
notes.content: Analysis of lessons learned and recommended actions to prevent similar incidents.
